We must be exemplary in action and united in the movement
I worked during 5 years the Presidency of the Republic in terrible tests which seized our country stupor
I have made sure that our country can hold on under these circumstances. It's my pride to be here
We have had crises and again we have done well. France remained France
We, France, have done all we could to keep Greece in Europe
We made sure to sign a historic climate agreement
We have this satisfaction, I leave a country in a much better state than the one I found
It is always up to the left to advance social progress and allow economic recovery
It was always socialists who made the country hope again when it doubted
I will not overwhelm you with everything we did, it would take too much time, it would take 5 years
But history will remember that we did the wedding for all
I have no doubt that what generations have done, responding to the name of socialism, will last and last
Politics is to be useful to those who are known to be in difficulty
There is no worse threat than that which would see our country doubt democracy
When one of our compatriots begins to doubt what democracy is, we have to go after him, convince him
It's so much easier to watch, to challenge, to lament, without ever putting your hands in the engine that moves the country forward.
I call you to invent the future that you must present to our people. The country needs you and will always need you
I have not stopped during 5 years to give priority to the youth and it is towards her that one must always turn
